w.note: тенето (also attested as теното, тоното) snare
The manuscript says боити, Tvorogov emends to объити surround (which we accept). Kuz′mina favorsоубити kill, but the context is about trapping, and not immediately about killing.
вътъкнꙋти, вътъкнꙋть stick (here: stuck his spear into the ground)
From *въз-сѣсти, въз-сѧдꙋть climb up and sit on (a horse), with assimilation (/zs/ → /ss/) and then degemination (→ /s/)
We emend to remove the trailing и because expect an aorist here. дати has aorist forms in both да and дастъ (even in OCS); дастъ is much more common in our main manuscript source.
Here: you alone will not (be able to) oppose the entire city
We emend this to follow the Greek spelling.
We emend this to follow the Greek spelling.
